data.question: What is the empirical formula of MUV-11 as determined from the synthesis conditions?
data.answer: The empirical formula of MUV-11 is [Ti2(Hbdha)2(H2bdha)]·(DMF)0.5·(H2O)3.3.

data.question: What method was used to determine the structure of MUV-11?
data.answer: The structure of MUV-11 was determined by combining direct methods, density functional theory (DFT) calculations, and Rietveld refinement.

data.question: What is the role of acetic acid in the synthesis of MUV-11?
data.answer: Acetic acid acts as a modulator in the synthesis of MUV-11.

data.question: How does the photocatalytic activity of MUV-11 compare to other Ti-MOFs in terms of hydrogen production?
data.answer: MUV-11 displays very low hydrogen production compared to other carboxylate Ti-MOFs under similar conditions, highlighting its poor performance and the necessity of using Pt as a cocatalyst to favor H2 production.

data.question: What experimental technique was used to confirm the chemical stability of MUV-11 in acid medium?
data.answer: ICP-MS analysis of the supernatants was used to confirm the chemical stability of MUV-11 in acid medium by showing negligible metal leaching.

data.question: True or False: The synthesis of MUV-11 can be scaled up to 20-fold without affecting its crystallinity and morphology.
data.answer: True

data.question: What is the significance of the shift to higher frequencies of the C-N stretching and bending modes in the IR spectrum of MUV-11?
data.answer: The shift to higher frequencies of the C-N stretching and bending modes in the IR spectrum of MUV-11 indicates an increasing double-bond character of the C-N bond in the imine tautomer upon coordination to titanium.

data.question: True or False: The photocatalytic efficiency of MUV-11 is primarily governed by thermodynamic energy alignment.
data.answer: False

data.question: What computational method was used to optimize the structural model of MUV-11 for Rietveld refinement?
data.answer: Density Functional Theory (DFT) calculations were used to optimize the structural model of MUV-11 for Rietveld refinement.

data.question: True or False: The presence of negligible optical activity in circular dichroism measurements of MUV-11 suggests the solid contains an equimolar mixture of both enantiomers.
data.answer: True

data.question: What is the role of TTTEI in the synthesis of MUV-11?
data.answer: TTTEI (titanium (IV) (triethanolaminato)isopropoxide) was identified as the most suitable precursor for the production of highly crystalline MUV-11.

data.question: How does the porosity of MUV-11 change after soaking in aqueous solutions at different pH values?
data.answer: The porosity of MUV-11 significantly reduces after soaking in aqueous solutions, especially in acid conditions, indicating a more favorable disruption of the H-bonds that control the packing in MUV-11.

data.question: True or False: The photocatalytic performance of MUV-11 is not improved when prepared from other titanium precursors.
data.answer: True

data.question: What does the weak signal in the EPR spectrum of MUV-11 after illumination indicate?
data.answer: The weak signal in the EPR spectrum of MUV-11 after illumination corresponds to the formation of photoexcited radicals with g ≈ 2.00 localized in the organic linker.

data.question: True or False: The structural amorphization of MUV-11 after photocatalytic experiments is associated with chemical degradation of the material.
data.answer: False

data.question: What does the shift in the 13C MAS NMR spectrum of MUV-11 compared to H4bdha indicate?
data.answer: The shift in the 13C MAS NMR spectrum of MUV-11 compared to H4bdha indicates the coordination of the ligand with Ti, showing a shift in the quaternary carbon corresponding to the carbonyl of the hydroxamic acid.

data.question: True or False: The photocatalytic nature of the reaction in MUV-11 is confirmed by the absence of H2 production in the dark.
data.answer: True

data.question: What is the effect of the internal rotation of the hydroxamate units on the structure of MUV-11?
data.answer: The internal rotation of the hydroxamate units in MUV-11 allows for more free rotation compared to NTU-9, resulting in a zigzag configuration of the layers due to the deviation of the planes from planarity.

data.question: True or False: The formation of photogenerated Ti3+ species in MUV-11 is confirmed by EPR spectroscopy after illumination.
data.answer: False

data.question: What does the presence of a weak broad band between 3400-2300 cm-1 in the FT-IR spectrum of MUV-11 indicate?
data.answer: The presence of a weak broad band between 3400-2300 cm-1 in the FT-IR spectrum of MUV-11 indicates the broadening of the N-H signal, consistent with the interlayer H-bonds of the type N-H···O present in MUV-11.
